comment: Hola Mario ! Estamos recin en segundo da de vacunacin, las filas de personal de los hospitales son grandes . Tengo entendido que todas las entidades que brindan servicios de salud y atencin Covid sern vacunadas Minsa, Essalud y Privados. Be patient.
amr:
# ::snt Hola Mario ! Estamos recin en segundo da de vacunacin, las filas de personal de los hospitales son grandes . Tengo entendido que todas las entidades que brindan servicios de salud y atencin Covid sern vacunadas Minsa, Essalud y Privados. Be patient.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hola
                  :mode expressive)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Mario")))
      :snt2 (r / recin-01
            :ARG0 (e / Estamos)
            :ARG1 (v / vacunacin)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (h4 / hospital)
                                          :ARG2 (m2 / member)))
                              :ARG2 (f / fila
                                    :mod (p4 / personal))
                              :poss (p5 / person
                                    :ARG0-of h3
                                    :ARG1 h4
                                    :ARG2 m2)))
                  :mod (g / grande)))
      :snt3 (e2 / entendido
            :ARG1-of (m3 / mean-01
                  :ARG2 (t / todas
                        :op1 e2
                        :domain t
                        :op1 (e3 / entidade
                              :mod (s2 / state
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Covid"))
                              :ARG0-of (b / brindan-01
                                    :ARG1 (s3 / servicios
                                          :topic (a / and
                                                :op1 (s4 / salud)
                                                :op2 (a2 / atencin-00
                                                      :ARG1 (c2 / company
                                                            :name (n3 / name
                                                                  :op1 "Essalud")))
                                                :op3 (c3 / company
                                                      :name (n4 / name
                                                            :op1 "Privado")))))))))
      :snt4 (p6 / patient-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG1 (y / you)))

comment: felicitaciones.Sergio nos han marginado a San Felipe , la.Anglo y la Delgado. sera coincidencia?, no existimos?
amr:
# ::snt felicitaciones.Sergio nos han marginado a San Felipe , la.Anglo y la Delgado. sera coincidencia?, no existimos?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / felicitaciones)
      :snt2 (h / han-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Sergio"))
            :ARG2 (m2 / margin
                  :ARG1-of (m3 / mean-01
                        :ARG2 (a / and
                              :op1 (p2 / person
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "La."
                                          :op2 "Anglo"))
                              :op2 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "La"
                                          :op2 "Delgado"))))))
      :snt3 (c / coincidencia
            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :domain (s / sera))
      :snt4 (e / existimos
            :polarity a2))
